text: Macintosh Printer Secrets is a 408-page hardcover book written by Larry Pina. It was first published in 1990 by Hayden Books, and is now out of print. The book teaches about dot matrix and ink-jet printers on the Apple Macintosh personal computers. == See also == * Larry Pina ==External links== * Macintosh Printer Secrets Review Category:Computer books Category:Macintosh peripherals Category:Apple Inc. printers Category:Books by Larry Pina
title: Macintosh Printer Secrets
